CustomField.formula:
IF( RecordType.Name = 'Client Projects' || (RecordType.Name = 'Internal Projects' && Name <> 'Bench') || (RecordType.Name = 'Global Projects' && Name <> 'OOO'&& Name <> 'Other'), 'Client',
IF( RecordType.Name = 'Global Projects' && Name = 'Other' , 'Other',
IF( RecordType.Name = 'Global Projects' && Name = 'OOO' , 'OOO',
IF( RecordType.Name = 'Internal Projects' && Name = 'Bench', 'Bench', 'Client') ) ) )
CustomField.label: Project Type
